name: The Silent Oracle
description:
The Silent Oracle is a dark fantasy interactive fiction game made in Twine. This demo gets you through the first chapter of the game. Explore one harrowing night in the life of a goblin and their best friend, and the duo's chance encounter with an oracle from another world. Decide who you are. Change your fate. Protect your friend, or just yourself. And above all, pray to Hel you make it home.

Content Warnings (may contain spoilers): HERE

The full game releases on May 28th!
